用纳米粒子对抗癌症纳米颗粒可能是对抗胰腺癌的未来，但也可能是目前没有治愈方法的肿瘤的未来。视频新闻稿综合介绍了 ULISES 项目的里程碑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Fighting-cancer-with-nanoarticles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Fighting-cancer-with-nanoarticles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3473e28f-9089-47b2-b317-350a2e95ac77 Thu, 27 Jun 2024 06:10:00 -0400 Fighting cancer with nanoparticles

50 岁以上成年人新发焦虑会使患帕金森病的风险增加一倍研究人员调查了新发焦虑症患者的帕金森病 (PD) 风险及相关危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/New-onset-anxiety-in-adults-ged-502b-doubles-risk-of-developmenting-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/New-onset-anxiety-in-adults-ged-502b-doubles-risk-of-developmenting-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b4c26a2-7226-4dbd-9e43-a97126707ec8 Thu, 27 Jun 2024 03:49:00 -0400 New-onset anxiety in adults aged 50+ doubles risk of developing Parkinson's disease
研究表明健康老年人未被识别的心脏瓣膜疾病的发生率很高东安格利亚大学领导的一项新研究首次揭示了老龄化人口中未确诊心脏瓣膜疾病的庞大规模。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Study-shows-high-rates-of-unrecognized-heart-valve-disease-in-healthy-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Study-shows-high-rates-of-unrecognized-heart-valve-disease-in-healthy-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1f670f4-22b3-48ae-9f1c-872017e15885 Thu, 27 Jun 2024 03:26:31 -0400 Study shows high rates of unrecognized heart valve disease in healthy seniors
研究确定了控制小鼠威胁反应和逃跑的关键神经元神经科学家发现，大脑如何双向控制对威胁的敏感性，从而启动和完成小鼠的逃跑行为。这些发现可能有助于探索治疗焦虑和创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Study-identizes-key-neurons-controlling-threat-response-and-escape-in​​-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Study-identizes-key-neurons-controlling-threat-response-and-escape-in​​-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f47ec5f2-7658-4daf-aa84-479f7e9391fb Thu, 27 Jun 2024 03:14:00 -0400 Study identifies key neurons controlling threat response and escape in mice
细胞分裂的安全隐患可能影响癌症生长根据研究人员的一项发现，在细胞完全致力于将自身分裂成两个新细胞的过程之前，它可以通过在可逆的中间状态停留多个小时（有时甚至超过一天）来确保其承诺的适当性在威尔康奈尔医学院。他们对生物学这一基本特征的揭示包括其机制和动力学的细节，这可能为未来针对癌症和其他疾病的疗法的开发提供信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Cell-divisions-hidden-safety-mechanism-may-influence-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240627/Cell-divisions-hidden-safety-mechanism-may-influence-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51b8bf61-8b0d-4dd4-908a-3817e3f6033d Thu, 27 Jun 2024 03:06:00 -0400 Cell division's hidden safety mechanism may influence cancer growth
